00035 #include "AbstractMeshReader.hpp"

00049 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM>
00050 class AbstractCachedMeshReader : public AbstractMeshReader<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>
00051 {
00052 protected:
00053 
00054     unsigned mNumNodeAttributes; 
00055     unsigned mMaxNodeBdyMarker; 
00056     unsigned mNumElementNodes; 
00057     unsigned mNumElementAttributes; 
00058     unsigned mMaxFaceBdyMarker; 
00060     std::vector<std::string> mNodeRawData;  
00061     std::vector<std::string> mElementRawData;  
00062     std::vector<std::string> mFaceRawData;  
00064     std::vector< std::vector<double> > mNodeData; 
00065     std::vector< std::vector<unsigned> > mElementData; 
00066     std::vector< std::vector<unsigned> > mFaceData; 
00068     std::vector< std::vector<double> >::iterator mpNodeIterator; 
00069     std::vector< std::vector<unsigned> >::iterator mpElementIterator; 
00070     std::vector< std::vector<unsigned> >::iterator mpFaceIterator; 
00072     bool mIndexFromZero; 
00081     std::vector<std::string> GetRawDataFromFile(const std::string& rFileName);
00082 
00083 public:
00084 
00085     AbstractCachedMeshReader(); 
00087     virtual ~AbstractCachedMeshReader()
00088     {} 
00090     unsigned GetNumElements() const; 
00091     unsigned GetNumNodes() const;    
00092     unsigned GetNumFaces() const;    
00093     unsigned GetNumEdges() const;    
00099     unsigned GetMaxNodeIndex();
00100 
00105     unsigned GetMinNodeIndex();
00106 
00111     std::vector<double> GetNextNode();
00112 
00113     void Reset(); 
00120     ElementData GetNextElementData();
00121 
00129     ElementData GetNextFaceData();
00130 
00131 };
